Phenotype of In Vitro Differentiated T Cells

After two round of differentiation cultures , T cells were stimulated by plate-immobilized anti - <extra_id_0> CD3 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> / <extra_id_0> CD28 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> and 3H-thymidine incorporation as measurement of proliferation was analyzed after 3 d of culture ( A ) .

Schematic Structure of the <extra_id_0> FOXP3 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> Gene and Location of the <extra_id_0> GATA3 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> Sites
The scheme shows the location of the 11 exons spaced by a large intron ( 6000 bp ) from the 5'untranslated region ( UTR ) .
Human , murine , and rat sequences are aligned and transcription start site ( TSS ) is indicated with an arrow .
